articles.title: Asia stock markets sink, oil hits 7-year high as Russia-Ukraine crisis escalates - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Brent crude futures jumped to a high of US$97.40 a barrel - their highest since September 2014.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Stock markets across Asia were in a sea of red, while oil prices hit seven-year highs amid the threat of a full-scale invasion of Ukraine by Russia.

articles.author: Clare Watson
articles.title: A Forgotten Continent From 40 Million Years Ago May Have Just Been Rediscovered - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A low-lying continent that existed some 40 million years ago and was home to exotic fauna may have "paved the way" for Asian mammals to colonize southern Europe, new research suggests.
articles.content:
A low-lying continent that existed some 40 million years ago and was home to exotic fauna may have "paved the way" for Asian mammals to colonize southern Europe, new research suggests.
